Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to the timing of emergency public safety alerts in the event of a disaster
Summary: Provides that any system for warning populations who are or may be endangered and for rapid and effective communication for any New York emergency alert notification shall occur within thirty minutes, or as soon as practicable thereafter.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the timing of emergency public safety alerts in the event of a disaster or state disaster emergency
